comments:
Occuring with version 4.1.2 / Eclipse 3.2.2

In a customer project (sorry, cannot post it here) I get an StackOverflowException when opening an Extension file. Even worse is if this file is open and autobuild enabled when Eclipse shuts down the Eclipse workspace won't start up again because of that error. It will be reported to .log and Eclipse does not start.


java.lang.StackOverflowError
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.dtree.AbstractDataTreeNode.childAtOrNull(AbstractDataTreeNode.java:207)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.dtree.DeltaDataTree.lookup(DeltaDataTree.java:666)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.watson.ElementTree.includes(ElementTree.java:528)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.getResourceInfo(Workspace.java:1177)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.getResourceInfo(Resource.java:1051)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.isOpen(Project.java:737)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.isAccessible(Project.java:690)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.internal.OawModelManager.findProject(OawModelManager.java:62)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.internal.OawProject.findCachedOawResource(OawProject.java:171)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.internal.OawProject.findCachedOawResource(OawProject.java:173)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.internal.OawProject.findCachedOawResource(OawProject.java:173)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.internal.OawProject.findCachedOawResource(OawProject.java:173)

I got more evidence:

This project contains an extension with JAVA extensions. The helper class is defined in another project, to which a build path dependency exists (project reference or plugin-dependency does not matter). 

When this build path dependency is established and the project is build once again (Project / Clean / all) the build fails with another StackOverflowException:

java.lang.StackOverflowError
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaModelManager.getPerProjectInfoCheckExistence(JavaModelManager.java:1504)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaProject.getPerProjectInfo(JavaProject.java:1911)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaProject.getResolvedClasspath(JavaProject.java:2049)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaProject.isOnClasspath(JavaProject.java:2486)
	at org.openarchitectureware.EmfMetamodelContributor.getMetamodels(EmfMetamodelContributor.java:58)
	at org.openarchitectureware.EmfMetamodelContributor.getMetamodels(EmfMetamodelContributor.java:47)
	at org.openarchitectureware.EmfMetamodelContributor.getMetamodels(EmfMetamodelContributor.java:47)
	at org.openarchitectureware.EmfMetamodelContributor.getMetamodels(EmfMetamodelContributor.java:47)

Infinite recursion was caused by a build path cycle. Introduced cycle detection in OawProject::findCachedOawResource().
In case of detection an error will be logged to the problems view. Since there is no causing exception OawLog.logError() must accept "null" as Throwable. (Was not the case - lead to NPE)

- OawProject 1.24
- OawLog 1.6
